txt.en: 'Wear it proudly, my king! No longer will you be called \qStonehelm.\q'
Knock the helm from Dómor's hand before he gives it to Thorin
'Now you will be \qThorin Strong-brow!\q'
Remain on your guard and protect the king from danger
Defeat Dómor
Remain on your guard for further danger
'Come with me.'
'What is that?'
Hrostyr, the personal guard of King Thorin, will bring you to see him.
You are waiting for an audience with King Thorin.
Something is not right! You have to stop Thorin from wearing that helm!

'You desire an audience with King Thorin? He will grant it, I am sure, but right now he is meeting with another. It should not be long. He hears a report from Dómor, one of the heroes that adventured in Mordor. He has returned with tidings for the king.'
A sensation of great evil emanates from the fallen helm!
You have come with Bósi for an audience with King Thorin III.
King Thorin has commanded you to keep Dómor from escaping.
DNT - Blah!
'The king fights with such ferocity!'
'Behold his boldness!'
'Truly he is Dáin's son!'

'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]. I will question Dómor before he is brought to the dungeons, but it seems clear what I will learn: he betrayed Eirek and Mogi to their deaths.\n\n'Do not go just yet. I will have further need of you in this matter.'
'What terror is this?'
'Protect the King Under the Mountain!'
'King Thorin!'
Evil has come to the Lonely Mountain, and the dwarves fight to defend their home.
Something is not right. You are overcome with an evil sensation!
'No! It was so near!'
'Lachagar! Come forth!'
'Die!'
'Aaagh!'
'Dwarves make for poor servants, it seems.'
'I will take this place for my own.'
'Slay the king and I may forgive your failures!'
'Overconfident fool!'
'I want him found! He must pay for his treachery.'
'A gift of treasure? What is it? What did you find?'
'Ah, what craftsmanship!'
'What is the meaning of this, [placeholder]?'
'What vile creature have you brought to my halls, Dómor?'
'I will deal with this creature! Do not allow Dómor to escape!'
'Stay back! I will end this creature myself!'
'Begone, you beast!'
'It is over!'
'Sadly, I have still not found any sign of Mogi.'
'[placeholder], to me.'
'The villain has quite disappeared.'
'I look forward to the day I can slay him for you!'
'But vengeance must wait, for I have found a valuable treasure.'
'I wished to bring it to you, my king!'
Instance: The King Under the Mountain
Talk to Hrostyr
'A well-crafted helm of great strength, in the finest tradition of our people!'
Wait with Bósi for your audience with King Thorin
'Here it is!'
